About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

For more than 13 years I have been engaged in promotion and sales of products. The last 9 years my main task was to develop the supply and sale of goods from Europe. During this period I formed and trained a team of specialists, increased the range of products and achieved the highest results in terms of sales and profits in the company.

I am a responsible and result-oriented team player. In general, I always take an active position and try to get to the heart of the matter to solve the tasks quickly and qualitatively.

The desire to develop moves me forward. So, I'm looking for new opportunities to improve my skills and achieve new goals.

Since spring 2018 I have been studying web development. I discovered a huge world of innovation and opportunities to grow. The ability to create something new, something weighty and useful, moves me to learn new technologies. And I like it!

* { There ain't nothing I can't do! }
